medical_history.chief_complaint: Short stature assessed at age 6 years.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Short stature was first identified when the patient presented at age 6 years. The patient exhibits a delay in growth and pubertal development.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Heterozygosity for GH-R77C/wt-GH identified; diagnosed with partial GH insensitivity.
medical_history.family_history: The mother and grandfather also carry the GH-R77C mutation and exhibit partial GH insensitivity with modest short stature.
medical_history.social_history: The patient immigrated to Switzerland at the age of 6 years; no other social history mentioned.
